languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво прикусывает ноготь, неотрывно глядя на доску. Потом протягивает руку и осторожно переставляет одну фигуру. Затем еще две. И еще две. Все его внимание поглощено перемещением фигур на доске.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво прикусывает ноготь, неотрывно глядя на доску. Потом протягивает руку и осторожно переставляет одну фигуру. Затем еще две. И еще две. Все его внимание поглощено перемещением фигур на доске.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво прикусывает ноготь, неотрывно глядя на доску. Потом протягивает руку и осторожно переставляет одну фигуру. Затем еще две. И еще две. Все его внимание поглощено перемещением фигур на доске.{/n}

{n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希咬着指甲，思考着，目光集中在棋盘上。随后他伸出手，小心翼翼地移动了一枚棋子，之后又移动了两枚棋子，随后又是两枚。他所有的注意力都集中在棋盘上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希咬着指甲，思考着，目光集中在棋盘上。随后他伸出手，小心翼翼地移动了一枚棋子，之后又移动了两枚棋子，随后又是两枚。他所有的注意力都集中在棋盘上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se muerde la uña, pensativo, sin apartar la mirada del tablero. Después alarga la mano y mueve cautelosamente una pieza. Luego otras dos. Y dos más. Dedica plenamente su atención a reorganizar el tablero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se muerde la uña, pensativo, sin apartar la mirada del tablero. Después alarga la mano y mueve cautelosamente una pieza. Luego otras dos. Y dos más. Dedica plenamente su atención a reorganizar el tablero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、盤面から目を離すことなく、爪を噛んで考え込んでいる。そして手を伸ばし、慎重に駒を動かす。そしてまた別の駒を2つ、さらに2つの駒を。彼の注意はすべて、盤面上の駒を並べ替えることに集中している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、盤面から目を離すことなく、爪を噛んで考え込んでいる。そして手を伸ばし、慎重に駒を動かす。そしてまた別の駒を2つ、さらに2つの駒を。彼の注意はすべて、盤面上の駒を並べ替えることに集中している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plongé dans ses réflexions, les yeux rivés sur le plateau, Heinrix finit par tendre la main pour déplacer une pièce. Puis deux autres. Puis encore deux autres. Il semble complètement absorbé par la réorganisation du plateau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plongé dans ses réflexions, les yeux rivés sur le plateau, Heinrix finit par tendre la main pour déplacer une pièce. Puis deux autres. Puis encore deux autres. Il semble complètement absorbé par la réorganisation du plateau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kaut gedankenverloren an seinen Nägeln, seine Augen sind dabei aufs Brett fixiert. Dann streckt er seine Hand aus und bewegt vorsichtig eine Figur. Danach zwei weitere Figuren. Und noch zwei Figuren. Er richtet seine ganze Aufmerksamkeit darauf, die Figuren auf dem Spielbrett zu manövrieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kaut gedankenverloren an seinen Nägeln, seine Augen sind dabei aufs Brett fixiert. Dann streckt er seine Hand aus und bewegt vorsichtig eine Figur. Danach zwei weitere Figuren. Und noch zwei Figuren. Er richtet seine ganze Aufmerksamkeit darauf, die Figuren auf dem Spielbrett zu manövrieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, tırnağını ısırarak düşünüyor. Gözleri oyun tahtasından ayrılmıyor. Ardından uzanarak dikkatle bir taşı hareket ettiriyor. Sonra da iki taşı ve iki taşı daha... Tüm dikkati, oyun tahtasındaki taşların yerlerini değiştirmeye odaklı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bites his nail in thought, his eyes not leaving the board. Then he reaches out and cautiously moves a piece. Then another two pieces. And another two. All of his attention is absorbed in rearranging the pieces on the board.{/n}
